🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Creating content creation tools, visualization tools, and debug tools within game engines, real-time 3D applications, and embedded systems.
📅 Created: Jul 2014 • Updated: Apr 2025

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Bloat-free graphical user interface library for C++
✅ Fast iterations and programmer empowerment
✅ Renderer agnostic and self-contained
✅ Minimal state synchronization
✅ Easy to use for dynamic UI creation
✅ Portable and efficient

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Dear ImGui is a bloat-free C++ graphical user interface library designed for rapid development of tools and visualizations. It prioritizes simplicity, portability, and efficiency, making it suitable for integration into game engines, real-time applications, and embedded systems. It empowers programmers to create dynamic UIs with minimal dependencies.

• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/ocornut/imgui

This repository serves as a handbook for data engineers, offering a curated collection of resources, including roadmaps, projects, interview advice, books, and communities. It aims to provide a comprehensive guide for individuals looking to learn about or advance their careers in data engineering by providing links to external resources.

Ratatui is a Rust crate that provides a flexible and simple way to build terminal user interfaces (TUIs). It offers a collection of widgets and layout components to create interactive console applications, dashboards, and other terminal-based programs. Ratatui also provides templates to help developers quickly get started with new projects.

𝗦𝗖𝗜𝗧𝗢𝗣𝗗𝗙 | Quickly fetching and downloading scientific papers from the command line.  🔥 Super Hot!

•••••••••••••••••••••••

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 💻 Shell 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Quickly fetching and downloading scientific papers from the command line.
📅 Created: Jan 2020 • Updated: Apr 2025

•••••••••••••••••••••••

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Fetches scientific papers using various search engines and databases (Crossref, Sci-Hub, Libgen).
✅ Accepts various inputs like DOI, URL, title, authors, etc.
✅ Offers command-line options for customization (download directory, quiet mode, etc.).
✅ Supports batch downloading from bibliography files.
✅ Provides options for setting Sci-Hub address and DNS.


•••••••••••••••••••••••

🔍 0 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

•••••••••••••••••••••••

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

SciToPDF is a shell script designed to simplify the process of obtaining scientific papers. It leverages multiple search engines and databases, accepting various forms of input to locate and download papers. The script offers a range of command-line options for customization, including batch downloading and directory management.

✅ Self-hosted audiobook and podcast server
✅ Open-source with Android & iOS app
✅ Audio streaming
✅ Podcast search and auto-download
✅ Multi-user support
✅ Progress syncing
✅ Automatic library updates
✅ Bulk upload
✅ Metadata backup
✅ PWA support
✅ Chromecast support
✅ Metadata fetching
✅ Chapter editor
✅ Audio file merging
✅ Metadata embedding

Audiobookshelf is a self-hosted server for managing and streaming audiobooks and podcasts. It offers features such as multi-user support, progress syncing, automatic library updates, and metadata management. It also supports ebook formats and provides an API for building custom tools.

⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃⁃

𝗩𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗢𝗦𝗘𝗔𝗟 | Open and efficient video watermarking for protecting video content.  🌟 Rising Fast!

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Open and efficient video watermarking for protecting video content.
📅 Created: Nov 2024 • Updated: Apr 2025

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Image and video watermarking
✅ Pre-trained models
✅ Training code
✅ Inference code
✅ Evaluation tools
✅ Baselines of state-of-the-art image watermarking models adapted for video watermarking (MBRS, CIN, TrustMark, and WAM)


━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

⭐⭐⭐ 344 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 40 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 7 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

The VideoSeal repository provides an open and efficient solution for video watermarking. It includes pre-trained models, training and inference code, and evaluation tools. The repository also offers baselines of state-of-the-art image watermarking models adapted for video, enabling users to easily embed and detect watermarks in video content.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

𝗕𝗥𝗢𝗪𝗦𝗘𝗥𝗩𝗜𝗖𝗘 | Browsing modern websites on older, historical web browsers by acting as a proxy server that renders the content into images.  🔥 Super Hot!

╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🔨 C++ 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Browsing modern websites on older, historical web browsers by acting as a proxy server that renders the content into images.
📅 Created: Apr 2020 • Updated: Apr 2025

╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Enables browsing the modern web on historical browsers
✅ Renders browser viewport into images
✅ Uses JavaScript application on the client browser to display images
✅ Supports command line arguments for customization (e.g., certificate exceptions, control bar visibility, initial zoom, font rendering)
✅ Provides binaries for patched CEF distribution for easier modification
✅ Supports page zooming
✅ Offers vice plugin API extensions
✅ Supports soft navigation buttons and partial blocking of local file access
✅ Supports running the proxy server on Windows


╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 1.2K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 31 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 94 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Browservice is a web proxy server that allows users to browse modern websites on historical browsers. It achieves this by rendering the browser viewport into images and displaying them on the client browser using a JavaScript application. The project provides up-to-date builds with the latest Chromium versions and offers various command-line options for customization and control.

╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌╌

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/ttalvitie/browservice

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Keep-Alive is a lightweight, cross-platform utility designed to prevent systems from going to sleep. It supports macOS, Windows, and Linux, offering configurable keep-alive durations and a simple, intuitive interface. The tool is ideal for maintaining active connections, ensuring uninterrupted downloads, and supporting long-running tasks.
